message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Alice, that price is a bit steep for me. I'm interested in the product, but I could only consider buying it for around $80.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $110.
Thanks for coming down on the price, Alice. To be honest, $100 is the highest I can go.  If it doesn't work for you, I understand.
I appreciate your honesty, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $115, but I'm not going any lower than that.
